name: cschemerotate.vim
description: Lame but fast (just ,b) switching of (now 3) different colorschemes. Useful when frequently switching between system console and transparent aterm window.
install_details: copy to $HOME/.vim/plugin directory (or its equivalent under Windoze)

versions.release_notes: parametrized, commented version using user's favourite colorschema (if set) as default.
